body_html: @ebrevdo hehehe? Actually, kinda stuck... if my Tensor is in GPU memory, how can I get the value in CPU memory? can't find any API function available in tensor.h or in Eigen Tensor for that, i.e., for the sequence_length to do the dynamic compute.

body: @ebrevdo hehehe? Actually, kinda stuck... if my Tensor is in GPU memory, how can I get the value in CPU memory? can't find any API function available in tensor.h or in Eigen Tensor for that, i.e., for the sequence_length to do the dynamic compute.
